com.github.jmkgreen.morphia
Class DatastoreImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.github.jmkgreen.morphia.DatastoreImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvancedDatastore, Datastore
public class DatastoreImpl
extends Object
implements Datastore, AdvancedDatastore

A generic (type-safe) wrapper around mongodb collections.

Author:
Scott Hernandez
